resources.string: Disclaimer: This app is currently not secure. We are using a fixed short list of possible emails to test the prototype. This can change when we trasnsfer the app to NASA\'s database. We are going to solve the problem of security, unique user identifiers and overwriting of images later.
Email is not valid\n\nMake sure you don\'t have any trailing spaces at the end
The permissions needed to run this part of the app were denied

Image upload failed.

 You may need to update this app to upload images.

 Please contact jpablomch@gmail.com"
GPS is not turned on. Please turn it on in your settings to continue
Location finding timed out\n\nPlease try again
Location finding timed out\nUsing a location found previously
